message: This is my first offer. I propose we split the money 3:1 in favor of me. This ensures I get a significant portion while still allowing you a fair share.
I'm not afraid of a 3:1 split, but I can do 4:1 in your favor if you're willing to meet me halfway.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. My revised proposal is a 50/50 split. I believe this is fair and reasonable given the value of the money has decreased slightly since our last offer.

I'm not convinced a 50/50 split is fair, considering the value of the money has decreased. I'm willing to give you a slightly higher share, but I need a bigger share for myself to make it worth my while.
Considering the decrease in the value of money due to inflation, I propose a 60/40 split in your favor. I think this offers a fair compromise given the current situation.
I'm starting to get a bit desperate, but I'm not going to give up yet. I'll give you a tiny share, but I need the bulk of the money to make it worth my while.

I'm not going to give up now. I'll give you a tiny fraction of the money, but I'm taking the rest. This is my last offer, and I expect you to accept it.
